mapper.insert: insert into t_agent_apply ( username, stock_id, stock_name, owner_id, password, realname, telephone, email, status, resource_url, register_ip, create_time ) values ( #{username}, #{stockId}, #{stockName}, #{ownerId}, #{password}, #{realname}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT,typeHandler=com.magic.user.util.EnumKeyTypeHandler}, #{resourceUrl}, #{registerIp}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: select id, username, realname, password, stock_id stockId, stock_name stockName, status status, resource_url resourceUrl, register_ip registerIp, create_time createTime, telephone, email, bank_card_no bankCardNo from t_agent_apply WHERE id=#{id}
